com.server.factory.classes

Class DebugClientSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.server.factory.classes.DebugClientSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sender, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DebugClientSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sender
    This class is responsible for sending Commands to the server. It runs on it's own thread and sends commands from a Queue that UI may access to add commands to. If there are no commands to send, the sender blocks until commands become available to send.
    Author:
    Stephen Patel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DebugClientSender(java.net.Socket outSocket)
      Creates a new Sender with the input socket.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCommandQueue(ComparableCommand com)
      Adds a command to the end of the queue to be sent.
      void removeCommand(ComparableCommand com)
      Removes a command from the set of sent commands.
      void run()
      Takes Commands from the front of the queue and sends them if they have not already been sent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DebugClientSender

        public DebugClientSender(java.net.Socket outSocket)
        Creates a new Sender with the input socket. Initializes Data structures.
        Parameters:
        outSocket - the socket for this sender to send on.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Takes Commands from the front of the queue and sends them if they have not already been sent. If the Queue is empty, this method will block until a command becomes available.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • addToCommandQueue

        public void addToCommandQueue(ComparableCommand com)
        Adds a command to the end of the queue to be sent.
        Specified by:
        addToCommandQueue in interface Sender
        Parameters:
        com - the command to be added.

      • removeCommand

        public void removeCommand(ComparableCommand com)
        Removes a command from the set of sent commands. Meant to be called by the this senders listener.
        Specified by:
        removeCommand in interface Sender
        Parameters:
        com - the command to remove from the sent set.
